However, the English translation "The Cologne-Ehrenfeld-Rheydt railway is a single-track, electrified main line in North Rhine-Westphalia." is incorrect because it changes the adjective "overwiegend" (which means "predominantly" in German) to "single-track" (which is not a correct adjective for the context).
